column4: Hi, just installed 5.10 and I seem to be missing a processor in my dual proc system.  mdesg says "WARNING: NR_CPUS limit of 1 reached. Processor ignored."
is this a limit in ubuntu or should i be looking elsewhere?
ie should i have done something else during the install process?
i believe you need to install a new kernel that will use 2 cpus; i am not sure where the doc is
